title: Holy crap the client is so fkd
body:

This time it was particularly bad, it wasn't just lag, but also the client bugging up and full on crashes and disconnections. But luckily it was dealt with quite quickly so an extra day of IP boost request/compensation is fine now, thought I would've fought harder if the issues had kept continuing.
IP Boosts are a rare/special occasion, but for us to have 'shorter' time than promised due to Riot's problems does make it sensible for Riot to compensate for it.

But since the issues went away reasonably quickly, everything is settled.
I dodged 4 queue pops on my smurf DESPITE accepting the ready check. Riot really should extend our free IP weekend.

I had a game go mental, freeze when I tried to quit, and after (hard) restarting PC and client, all in-game setting were back to default.
Cool patch Rito A+.
